snippet: Seven European countries have expressed interest in hosting the Ryder Cup in 2022: Austria, Denmark, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Spain and Turkey.
lead_paragraph: Seven European countries have expressed interest in hosting the Ryder Cup in 2022: Austria, Denmark, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Spain and Turkey.

headline.main: Seven Nations Seek to Host 2022 Ryder Cup
headline.print_headline: Nations Seek to Host 2022 Ryder Cup
